description:
What is the course about?

This course teaches you the correct way to understand and utilize Circle of Fifths, and the easiest way to memorize it. With these techniques, you can remember all major and minor keys and their key signatures.

Why take this course?

If you have difficulties to master major and minor keys; if you can not map keys and their key signatures very well; or if you find that Circle Of Fifths is too hard to remember.

How is the course structured?

This course starts with the introduction to some necessary music theory. After that, we will start our Circle Of Fifths journey. I will teach you the correct way to look at Circle Of Fifths and how to memorize it easily. I will also go through how it connects the keys and key signatures. In addition, I will walk you through how to derive major and minors key from Circle Of Fifths.
title: Master Circle Of Fifths to Find Keys - Jin's Theory
